= Introduction =

= Jenkins =

Add in maven :
 * -s/jenkins/tools/Maven/Maven-3.0.4/conf/settings.xml
 * maven.repo.local=/usr/share/tomcat6/.m2/repository
 * -Xms256m -Xmx512m -XX:PermSize=80M -XX:MaxPermSize=256M
 * -Psample

Do not use goals (it does not works) :
 * javancss:report
 * jdepend:generate

Do not use report (it does not works) :
 * JavaNCSS
 * JDepend

For clover and dashboard add :
 * java.awt.headless=true

== Ubuntu ==

Install Jenkins on ubuntu

{{{
sudo groupadd build
sudo useradd --create-home --shell /bin/bash --groups build jenkins
}}}
